Description: Calling all collectors, I have for sale a pair of Oakley Romeo 1 X-Metal sunglasses with Black Iridium lenses in great shape. The glasses were worn, although not heavily, so they are not in unworn/mint condition and do show very slight signs of wear. These sunglasses come with virtually all the original parts (no warranty card) which includes the box, the Romeo coin, the original microfiber bag, 2 nose bombs/pads (different sizes), 3 temple shocks (15, 25, 50), ear socks, and upper/lower gaskets. Surprisingly, most of the rubber parts look excellent except for maybe the gaskets. In addition to all these parts, I've added a custom cut pair of purple lenses and a American flag microfiber bag. The custom cut lenses were not done very well to be honest, but they are included nonetheless. Also, the foam in the glasses box has deteriorated over the years. The original lenses have the usual spider cracks, but they never bothered me and are pretty small compared to some of the cracks I've seen on other Oakley Romeos. I've tried my best to capture the cracks in the provided photos. The serial number for the glasses is 076509. I have more photos than the 12 provided here if you want to see more angles. Buyer should provide payment within 48hrs or I reserve the right to relist the glasses. The sunglasses will be shipped within 72hrs of payment with protection in mind and with proper insurance as well which is included in the price. If you happen to be local to Seattle, I will lower the final price. No international shipping or anything outside of the contiguous US (48 adjoining states) and no returns. Please feel free to ask any questions.
